store_info.description_short: Free browser based real-time video calls.
description_long: Free browser based real-time video calls. Simple, Secure, Fast.
Start your next video call with a single click. No download, plug-in, or login is required. Just get straight to talking, messaging, and sharing your screen.
store_info.hint: All rooms are public, so you should chose hard-to-guess names for sensitive topics.
